gym_ghost_040_receptionist_00:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Welcome to the Montenevera Gym,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].
gym_ghost_040_receptionist_01:
Are you ready to challenge Gym Leader Ryme,
the MC of RIP?
gym_ghost_040_receptionist_02:
Very well. Allow me to show you to the
battle court.
gym_ghost_040_receptionist_03:
Of course. Please feel free to come speak to me
whenever you’re ready.
gym_ghost_040_receptionist_nobattle:
Oh! You will need at least two Pokémon fit for
battle in order to challenge Ryme!
gym_ghost_040_system_01:
It sounds like there might be a rap battle going
on over at the stage.
gym_ghost_040_man_01:
This is MY time, and this is MY day!
You’re not gonna stand in my way!
gym_ghost_040_man_02:
Listen up, Ryme—your reign ends here!
You’re gonna get rung up by this pro cashier!
gym_ghost_040_ghost_01:
Pro cashier? Well, I’m about to check out.
Musta got your rhymes on deep discount![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_02:
Please—you think you can step to my game?
Fool, I got “rhyme” right there in my name!\c
I’m a specter from which there is no protector,
and victory unto me you will render when the\r
crowd sees you’re a mere pretender![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_03:
You wanna end my reign? Yeah—keep dreamin’.
Buy a book of rhymes, kid, and start readin’![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_man_03:
I’m done—you won! My rhymes totally whiffed!
But I’ll be back—maybe after my next shift!
gym_ghost_040_ghost_04:
Hold up! Where you goin’? That’s all you got?!\c
“After my next shift”? Seriously? Bars over jokes,
come on![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_05:
That was over way too fast. It gets boring wearin’
the crown if no one makes me fight to keep it.[VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_07:
Hey, my opener’s back! You here for a rap battle
or a Gym battle?[VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_select_01: I’m here for a Gym battle!
gym_ghost_040_select_02: I’m here for a rap battle!
gym_ghost_040_ghost_08: As if I even needed to ask![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_09:
Hah! You got jokes! We both know why you’re
REALLY here.[VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_10: You were captivated by that show I put on, huh?[VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_11:
I rap what’s in my soul, baby. Weavin’ words into
a symphony of poetry.[VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_12:
Don’t try it with me—you won’t last one round.
I’m like Sableye: my Mean Look’ll lock you down!\c
Like that! You feel me?[VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_13:
Heh. Well, let’s get to it—you’re a Pokémon
Trainer. So battle me, and show me who you are![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_14:
My music’s not all that tops the charts—my skills
with Ghost types are the best around![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_15:
Lest you forget it, the name is Ryme, and I’m
known as the MC of RIP![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_16: Dead or alive, let’s make this a vibe![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_18:
You’ve got spirit, kid. You earned my Gym
Badge, all right![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_19: And how about a VIP pass for my next show, too?[VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_badge:
With [VAR NUM1(0001)] Gym Badge[VAR NUMBRNCH(0001,0100)]s, it’ll be easier to catch
Pokémon of up to Lv. [VAR NUM2(0002)], and they’ll listen to\r
what you have to say, too![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_badge_all:
With 8 Gym Badges, you’ll be able to catch
Pokémon of any level, and they’ll be sure to\r
listen to what you have to say, too![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_waza:
I’m feelin’ so good that I think I’m also gonna let
you have this![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_20:
Too bad it’s over! Make your way back to my
stage sometime. Maybe next time, we rap battle\r
instead. Who knows?[VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_ghost_21:
I’m sure you’ve got some scary-good adventures
ahead. I’ll be cheerin’ for ya! Later![VAR 0114(001B)]
gym_ghost_040_receptionist_04:
Congratulations! You’re now certified by the
Montenevera Gym!
